GV05brup___u:1: sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇo vyāttam agnir vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsara ātmāśvasya medhyasya |
GV05brup___u:2_0: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaraṃ pṛthivī pājasyaṃ diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśava ṛtavo 'ṅgāni māsāś cārdhamāsāś ca parvāṇy
GV05brup___u:2_1: ahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇy asthīni nabho māṃsāni ūvadhyaṃ sikatāḥ sindhavo gudā yakṛc ca klomānaś ca parvatā oṣadhayaś
GV05brup___u:12: etau vā aśvaṃ mahimānāv abhitaḥ sambabhūvatuḥ |
GV05brup___u:13: hayo bhūtvā devān avahad vājī gandharvān arvāsurān aśvo manuṣyān |
GV05brup___u:14: samudra evāsya bandhuḥ samudro yoniḥ || BrhUp_1,1.2 ||
GV05brup___u:21: arcate vai me kam abhūd iti |
GV05brup___u:23: kaṃ ha vā asmai bhavati ya evam etad arkyasyārkatvaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,2.1
GV05brup___u:25: tad yad apāṃ śara āsīt tat samahanyata |
GV05brup___u:28: tasya śrāntasya taptasya tejoraso niravartatāgniḥ || BrhUp_1,2.2 ||
GV05brup___u:29: sa tredhātmānaṃ vyakurutādityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vāyuṃ tṛtīyam |
GV05brup___u:31: tasya prācī dik śiro 'sau cāsau cermau |
GV05brup___u:32: athāsya pratīcī dik puccham asau cāsau ca sakthyau |
GV05brup___u:34: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaram iyam uraḥ |
GV05brup___u:36: yatra kva caiti tad eva pratitiṣṭhaty evaṃ vidvān || BrhUp_1,2.3 ||
GV05brup___u:38: sa manasā vācaṃ mithunaṃ samabhavad aśanāyā mṛtyuḥ |
GV05brup___u:39: tad yad reta āsīt sa saṃvatsaro 'bhavat |
GV05brup___u:40: na ha purā tataḥ saṃvatsara āsa |
GV05brup___u:41: tam etāvantaṃ kālam abibhar yāvānt saṃvatsaraḥ |
GV05brup___u:46: sa aikṣata yadi vā imam abhimaṃsye kanīyo 'nnaṃ kariṣya iti |
GV05brup___u:47: sa tayā vācā tenātmanedaṃ sarvam asṛjata yad idaṃ kiñca -- ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni chandāṃsi yajñān prajāṃ paśūn |
GV05brup___u:48: sa yad-yad evāsṛjata tattad attum adhriyata |
GV05brup___u:49: sarvaṃ vā attīti tad aditer adititvam |
GV05brup___u:50: sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evam etad aditer adititvaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,2.5
GV05brup___u:54: tasya śrāntasya taptasya yaśo vīryam udakrāmat |
GV05brup___u:57: tasya śarīra eva mana āsīt || BrhUp_1,2.6 ||
GV05brup___u:58: so 'kāmayata -- medhyaṃ ma idaṃ syād ātmanvy anena syām iti |
GV05brup___u:60: yad aśvat tan medhyam abhūd iti tad evāśvamedhasyāśvamedhatvam |
GV05brup___u:61: eṣa ha vā aśvamedhaṃ veda ya enam evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:66: eṣa vā aśvamedho ya eṣa tapati |
GV05brup___u:71: so punar ekaiva devatā bhavati mṛtyur eva |
GV05brup___u:77: dvayā ha prājāpatyā devāś cāsurāś ca tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ |
GV05brup___u:79: te ha devā ūcur hantāsurān yajña udgīthenātyayāmeti || BrhUp_1,3.1 ||
GV05brup___u:80: te ha vācam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:82: yo vāci bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:86: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ vadati |
GV05brup___u:88: atha ha prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:90: yaḥ prāṇe bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:94: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ jighrati |
GV05brup___u:96: atha ha cakṣur ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:98: yaś cakṣuṣi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:102: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ paśyati |
GV05brup___u:104: atha ha śrotram ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:106: yaḥ śrotre bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:113: atha ha mana ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:115: yo manasi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:122: evam u khalv etā devatāḥ pāpmabhir upāsṛjan |
GV05brup___u:124: atha hemam āsanyaṃ prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:128: sa yathāśmānam ṛtvā loṣṭo vidhvaṃsetaivaṃ haiva vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco vineśuḥ |
GV05brup___u:130: bhavaty ātmanā, parāsya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05brup___u:131: te hocuḥ -- kva nu so 'bhūd yo na ittham asakteti |
GV05brup___u:134: sā vā eṣā devatā dūr nāma |
GV05brup___u:136: dūraṃ ha vā asmān mṛtyur bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.9 ||
GV05brup___u:137: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatya yatrāsāṃ diśām antas tad gamayāṃ cakāra |
GV05brup___u:139: tasmān na janam iyān nāntam iyān net pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum anvavāyānīti ||
GV05brup___u:140: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatyāthainā mṛtyum atyavahat || BrhUp_1,3.11
GV05brup___u:141: sā vai vācam eva prathamām atyavahat |
GV05brup___u:142: sā yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata so 'gnir abhavat |
GV05brup___u:143: so 'yam agniḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto dīpyate || BrhUp_1,3.12 ||
GV05brup___u:145: sa yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa vāyur abhavat |
GV05brup___u:146: so 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntaḥ pavate || BrhUp_1,3.13 ||
GV05brup___u:148: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa ādityo 'bhavat |
GV05brup___u:149: so 'sāv ādityaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntas tapati || BrhUp_1,3.14 ||
GV05brup___u:151: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata tā diśo 'bhavan |
GV05brup___u:152: tā imā diśaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntāḥ || BrhUp_1,3.15 ||
GV05brup___u:154: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa candramā abhavat |
GV05brup___u:155: so 'sau candraḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto bhāti |
GV05brup___u:156: evaṃ ha vā enam eṣā devatā mṛtyum ativahati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.16
GV05brup___u:158: yad dhi kiñcānnam adyate 'nenaiva tad adyate |
GV05brup___u:161: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad annam |
GV05brup___u:166: tasmād yad anenānnam atti tenaitās tṛpyanti |
GV05brup___u:167: evaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisaṃviśanti bhartā svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavaty annādo 'dhipatir ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:168: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratir bubhūṣati na haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati |
GV05brup___u:169: atha ya evaitam anubhavati yo vaitam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati so 'yāsya āṅgiraso 'ṅgānāṃ hi rasaḥ |
GV05brup___u:172: tasmād yasmāt kasmāccāṅgāt prāṇa utkrāmati tad eva tac chuṣyati |
GV05brup___u:173: eṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ || BrhUp_1,3.19 ||
GV05brup___u:176: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u bṛhaspatiḥ || BrhUp_1,3.20 ||
GV05brup___u:179: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u brahmaṇaspatiḥ || BrhUp_1,3.21 ||
GV05brup___u:181: vāg vai sāmaiṣa sā cāmaś ceti tat sāmnaḥ sāmatvam |
GV05brup___u:182: yad v eva samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhis tribhir lokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa tasmād v eva sāma |
GV05brup___u:184: ya evam etat sāma veda || BrhUp_1,3.22 ||
GV05brup___u:186: prāṇo vā ut prāṇena hīdaṃ sarvam uttabdham |
GV05brup___u:190: tad dhāpi brahmadattaś caikitāneyo rājānaṃ bhakṣayann uvāca |
GV05brup___u:191: ayaṃ tyasya rājā mūrdhānaṃ vipātayatād yad ito 'yāsya āṅgiraso
GV05brup___u:193: vācā ca hy eva sa prāṇena codagāyad iti || BrhUp_1,3.24 ||
GV05brup___u:194: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ svaṃ veda bhavati hāsya svam |
GV05brup___u:196: tasmād ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyan vāci svaram iccheta |
GV05brup___u:200: bhavati hāsya svaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ svaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.25 ||
GV05brup___u:201: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda bhavati hāsya suvarṇam |
GV05brup___u:203: bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.26
GV05brup___u:204: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhati |
GV05brup___u:206: vāci hi khalv eṣa etat prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhito gīyate |
GV05brup___u:207: anna ity u haika āhuḥ || BrhUp_1,3.27 ||
GV05brup___u:209: sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti |
GV05brup___u:210: sa yatra prastuyāt tad etāni japet |
GV05brup___u:211: asato mā sad gamaya, tamaso mā jyotir gamaya, mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayeti |
GV05brup___u:212: sa yad āhāsato mā sad gamayeti |
GV05brup___u:213: mṛtyur vā asat sad amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha |
GV05brup___u:215: mṛtyur vai tamo jyotir amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha |
GV05brup___u:218: atha yānītarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣv ātmane 'nnādyam āgāyet |
GV05brup___u:221: sa eṣa evaṃvid udgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam āgāyati
GV05brup___u:223: na haivālokyatāyā āśāsti ya evam etat sāma veda || BrhUp_1,3.28 ||
GV05brup___u:228: tasmād apy etarhy āmantrito 'ham ayam ity evāgra uktvāthānyan nāma prabrūte yad asya bhavati
GV05brup___u:229: sa yat pūrvo 'smāt sarvasmāt sarvān pāpmana auṣat tasmāt puruṣaḥ |
GV05brup___u:230: oṣati ha vai sa taṃ yo 'smāt pūrvo bubhūṣati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.1
GV05brup___u:232: sa hāyam īkṣāṃ cakre, yan mad anyan nāsti kasmān nu bibhemīti |
GV05brup___u:239: sa haitāvān āsa yathā strīpumāṃsau sampariṣvaktau |
GV05brup___u:242: tasmād idam ardhabṛgalam iva sva iti ha smāha yājñavalkyaḥ |
GV05brup___u:243: tasmād ayam ākāśaḥ striyā pūryata eva |
GV05brup___u:246: so heyam īkṣāṃ cakre -- kathaṃ nu mātmana eva janayitvā sambhavati |
GV05brup___u:259: evam eva yad idaṃ kiñca mithunam ā pipīlikābhyas tat sarvam asṛjata ||
GV05brup___u:260: so 'ved ahaṃ vāva sṛṣṭir asmy ahaṃ hīdaṃ sarvam asṛkṣīti |
GV05brup___u:262: sṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.5 ||
GV05brup___u:264: sa mukhāc ca yoner hastābhyāṃ cāgnim asṛjata |
GV05brup___u:267: tad yad idam āhur amuṃ yajāmuṃ yajety ekaikaṃ devam etasyaiva sā visṛṣṭiḥ
GV05brup___u:268: eṣa u hy eva sarve devāḥ |
GV05brup___u:269: atha yat kiñcedam ārdraṃ tad retaso 'sṛjata |
GV05brup___u:271: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvam annaṃ caivānnādaś ca |
GV05brup___u:274: yac chreyaso devān asṛjatātha yan martyaḥ sann amṛtān asṛjata tasmād atisṛṣṭir |
GV05brup___u:275: atisṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.6 ||
GV05brup___u:277: tan nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyatāsau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti |
GV05brup___u:278: tad idam apy etarhi nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyata asau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti |
GV05brup___u:279: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ā nakhāgrebhyo yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne 'vahitaḥ syād viśvambharo vā viśvambharakulāye
GV05brup___u:281: akṛtsno hi saḥ prāṇann eva prāṇo nāma bhavati |
GV05brup___u:282: vadan vāk paśyaṃś cakṣuḥ śṛṇvañ chrotraṃ manvāno manaḥ |
GV05brup___u:284: sa yo 'ta ekaikam upāste na sa veda |
GV05brup___u:287: atra hy ete sarva ekaṃ bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:288: tad etat padanīyam asya sarvasya yad ayam ātmā |
GV05brup___u:290: yathā ha vai padenānuvinded evaṃ kīrtiṃ ślokaṃ vindate ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05brup___u:291: tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmā
GV05brup___u:292: sa yo 'nyam ātmanaḥ priyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ brūyāt priyaṃ rotsyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva syāt |
GV05brup___u:294: sa ya ātmānam eva priyam upāste na hāsya priyaṃ pramāyukaṃ bhavati ||
GV05brup___u:295: tad āhur yad brahmavidyayā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyanto manuṣyā manyante |
GV05brup___u:296: kim u tad brahmāved yasmāt tat sarvam abhavad iti || BrhUp_1,4.9 ||
GV05brup___u:301: tad yo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat |
GV05brup___u:304: tad dhaitat paśyann ṛṣir vāmadevaḥ pratipede 'haṃ manur abhavaṃ sūryaś
GV05brup___u:306: tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:307: tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśate |
GV05brup___u:309: atha yo 'nyāṃ devatām upāste 'nyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda |
GV05brup___u:311: yathā ha vai bahavaḥ paśavo manuṣyaṃ bhuñjyur evam ekaikaḥ puruṣo devān bhunakti |
GV05brup___u:312: ekasminn eva paśāv ādīyamāne 'priyaṃ bhavati kim u bahuṣu |
GV05brup___u:313: tasmād eṣāṃ tan na priyaṃ yad etan manuṣyā vidyuḥ || BrhUp_1,4.10 ||
GV05brup___u:314: brahma vā idam agra āsīd ekam eva |
GV05brup___u:316: tac chreyo rūpam atyasṛjata kṣatraṃ, yāny etāni devatrā kṣatrāṇīndro varuṇaḥ somo rudraḥ parjanyo yamo mṛtyur īśāna iti |
GV05brup___u:318: tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaṃ adhastād upāste rājasūye |
GV05brup___u:321: tasmād yady api rājā paramatāṃ gacchati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yonim |
GV05brup___u:322: ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ sa yonim ṛcchati |
GV05brup___u:323: sa pāpīyān bhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā || BrhUp_1,4.11 ||
GV05brup___u:326: yāny etāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti || BrhUp_1,4.12
GV05brup___u:330: iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yad idaṃ kiñca || BrhUp_1,4.13 ||
GV05brup___u:333: tad etat kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ yad dharmaḥ |
GV05brup___u:337: yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyaṃ vai tat |
GV05brup___u:338: tasmāt satyaṃ vadantam āhur dharmaṃ vadatīti |
GV05brup___u:340: etad dhy evaitad ubhayaṃ bhavati || BrhUp_1,4.14 ||
GV05brup___u:341: tad etad brahma kṣatraṃ viṭ śūdraḥ |
GV05brup___u:342: tad agninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavad brāhmaṇo manuṣyeṣu, kṣatriyeṇa
GV05brup___u:344: tasmād agnāv eva deveṣu lokam icchante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣu |
GV05brup___u:346: atha yo ha vā asmāl lokāt svaṃ lokam adṛṣṭvā praiti sa enam avidito na bhunakti yathā vedo vānanūkto 'nyad vā karmākṛtam |
GV05brup___u:347: yadi ha vā apy anevaṃvin mahatpuṇyaṃ karma karoti tad dhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata eva |
GV05brup___u:349: sa ya ātmānam eva lokam upāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate |
GV05brup___u:350: asmād dhy evātmano yadyat kāmayate tattat sṛjate || BrhUp_1,4.15 ||
GV05brup___u:351: atho ayaṃ vā ātmā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brup___u:352: sa yaj juhoti yad yajate tena devānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brup___u:354: atha yat pitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti yat prajām icchate tena pitṝṇām |
GV05brup___u:355: atha yan manuṣyān vāsayate yad ebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām |
GV05brup___u:356: atha yat paśubhyas tṛṇodakaṃ vindati tena paśūnām |
GV05brup___u:357: yad asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsy ā pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brup___u:358: yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭim icchet |
GV05brup___u:359: evaṃ haivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāny ariṣṭim icchanti |
GV05brup___u:360: tad vā etad viditaṃ mīmāṃsitam || BrhUp_1,4.16 ||
GV05brup___u:362: so 'kāmayata jāyā me syād atha prajāyeya |
GV05brup___u:363: atha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti |
GV05brup___u:366: tasmād apy etarhy ekākī kāmayate -- jāyā me syād atha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ
GV05brup___u:368: sa yāvad apy eteṣām ekaikaṃ na prāpnoty akṛtsna eva tāvan manyate |
GV05brup___u:382: pāṅktam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiñca |
GV05brup___u:383: tad idaṃ sarvam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.17 ||
GV05brup___u:385: ekam asya sādhāraṇaṃ dve devān abhājayat |
GV05brup___u:387: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na |
GV05brup___u:388: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadā |
GV05brup___u:389: yo vai tām akṣitiṃ veda so 'nnam atti pratīkena |
GV05brup___u:390: sa devān apigacchati sa ūṛjam upajīvati |
GV05brup___u:393: medhayā hi tapasājanayat pitaikam asya sādhāraṇam iti |
GV05brup___u:394: idam evāsya tat sādhāraṇam annaṃ yad idam adyate |
GV05brup___u:395: sa ya etad upāste na sa pāpmano vyāvartate |
GV05brup___u:399: tasmād devebhyo juhvati ca pra ca juhvati |
GV05brup___u:404: payo hy evāgre manuṣyāś ca paśavaś copajīvanti |

GV05brup___u:406: atha vatsaṃ jātam āhus tṛṇād iti |
GV05brup___u:407: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti |
GV05brup___u:408: payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na |

GV05brup___u:418: sa hīdam annaṃ dhiyādhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ |

GV05brup___u:425: anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nādarśam anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam iti manasā hy eva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti |
GV05brup___u:426: kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva |
GV05brup___u:427: tasmād api pṛṣṭhata upaspṛṣṭo manasā vijānāti |

GV05brup___u:429: eṣā hy antaṃ āyattaiṣā hi na |
GV05brup___u:430: prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samāno 'na ity etat sarvaṃ prāṇa eva |

GV05brup___u:438: vāg eva devā manaḥ pitaraḥ, prāṇo mānuṣyāḥ || BrhUp_1,5.6 ||
GV05brup___u:440: mana eva pitā vāṅ mātā prāṇaḥ prajā || BrhUp_1,5.7 ||
GV05brup___u:442: yat kiñca vijñātaṃ vācas tad rūpam |
GV05brup___u:445: yat kiñca vijijñāsyaṃ manasas tad rūpam |
GV05brup___u:453: tad yāvaty eva vāk tāvatī pṛthivī tāvān ayam agniḥ || BrhUp_1,5.11 ||
GV05brup___u:456: tad yāvad eva manas tāvatī dyaus tāvān asāv ādityaḥ |
GV05brup___u:462: nāsya sapatno bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,5.12 ||
GV05brup___u:465: tad yāvān eva prāṇas tāvatya āpas tāvān asau candraḥ |
GV05brup___u:466: ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ |
GV05brup___u:467: sa yo haitān antavata upāste 'ntavantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati |
GV05brup___u:468: atha yo haitān anantān upāste 'nantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati || BrhUp_1,5.13 ||
GV05brup___u:472: sa rātribhir evā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate |
GV05brup___u:473: so 'māvāsyāṃ rātrim etayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvam idaṃ prāṇabhṛd anupraviśya tataḥ prātar jāyate |
GV05brup___u:474: tasmād etāṃ rātriṃ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicchindyād api kṛkalāsasyaitasyā eva devatāyā apacityai yo vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakālo 'yam eva sa yo 'yam evaṃvit puruṣaḥ |
GV05brup___u:477: sa vittenaivā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate |
GV05brup___u:478: tad etan nabhyaṃ yad ayam ātmā |
GV05brup___u:480: tasmād yady api sarvajyāniṃ jīyata ātmanā cej jīvati pradhināgād ity evāhuḥ || BrhUp_1,5.15
GV05brup___u:481: atha trayo vāva lokā manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti |
GV05brup___u:482: so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā |
GV05brup___u:488: yadā praiṣyan manyate 'tha putram āha -- tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ loka iti |
GV05brup___u:490: sa putraḥ pratyāhāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'ham loka iti |
GV05brup___u:491: yad vai kiñcānūktaṃ tasya sarvasya brahmety ekatā |
GV05brup___u:492: ye vai ke ca yajñās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ity ekatā |
GV05brup___u:493: ye vai ke ca lokās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ity ekatā |
GV05brup___u:495: etan mā sarvaṃ sann ayam ito bhunajad iti |
GV05brup___u:498: sa yadaivaṃvid asmāl lokāt praity athaibhir eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati |
GV05brup___u:499: sa yady anena kiñcid akṣṇayā kṛtaṃ bhavati tasmād enaṃ sarvasmāt putro muñcati tasmāt putro nāma |
GV05brup___u:501: athainam ete devāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti || BrhUp_1,5.17 ||
GV05brup___u:502: pṛthivyai cainam agneś ca daivī vāg āviśati |
GV05brup___u:503: sā vai daivī vāg yayā yad yad eva vadati tat tad bhavati || BrhUp_1,5.18
GV05brup___u:504: divaś cainam ādityāc ca daivaṃ mana āviśati |
GV05brup___u:505: tad vai daivaṃ mano yenānandy eva bhavaty atho na śocati || BrhUp_1,5.19
GV05brup___u:506: adbhyaś cainaṃ candramasaś ca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati |
GV05brup___u:507: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati |
GV05brup___u:508: sa eṣa evaṃvit sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā bhavati |
GV05brup___u:510: yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanty evaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanti |
GV05brup___u:511: yad u kiñcemāḥ prajāḥ śocanty amaivāsāṃ tad bhavati |
GV05brup___u:513: na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati || BrhUp_1,5.20 ||
GV05brup___u:527: athemam eva nāpnot yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ |

GV05brup___u:533: tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:535: anuśuṣya haivāntato mriyata ity adhyātmam || BrhUp_1,5.21 ||
GV05brup___u:541: sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evam etāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ |
GV05brup___u:542: mlocanti hy anyā devatā na vāyuḥ |
GV05brup___u:545: yataś codeti sūryo 'staṃ yatra ca gacchatīti |
GV05brup___u:546: prāṇād vā eṣa udeti prāṇe 'stam eti |
GV05brup___u:547: taṃ devāś cakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti |
GV05brup___u:548: yad vā ete 'murhy adhriyanta tad evāpy adya kurvanti |
GV05brup___u:549: tasmād ekam eva vrataṃ caret prāṇyāc caivāpānyāc ca |
GV05brup___u:550: nen mā pāpmā mṛtyur āpnavad iti |
GV05brup___u:551: yady u caret samāpipayiṣet teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati || BrhUp_1,5.23
GV05brup___u:552: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma |
GV05brup___u:553: teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāg ity etad eṣām uktham |

GV05brup___u:565: atha karmaṇām ātmety etad eṣām uktham |

GV05brup___u:578: sa hovācājātaśatruṃ kāśyaṃ -- brahma te bravāṇīti |
GV05brup___u:579: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- sahasram etasyāṃ vāci dadmaḥ, janako janaka iti vai janā dhāvantīti sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsāv āditye puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |

GV05brup___u:583: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau candre puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:585: bṛhan pāṇdaravāsāḥ somo rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:586: sa ya etam evam upāste 'har-ahar sutaḥ prasuto bhavati |
GV05brup___u:588: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau vidyuti puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:590: tejasvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:591: sa ya etam evam upāste tejasvī ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:593: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ākāśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:595: pūrṇam apravartīti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:596: sa ya etam evam upāste pūryate prajayā paśubhir nāsyāsmāl lokāt prajodvartate || BrhUp_2,1.5
GV05brup___u:597: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ vāyau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:599: indro vaikuṇṭho 'parājitā seneti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:600: sa ya etam evam upāste jiṣṇur hāparājiṣṇur bhavaty anyatastyajāyī ||
GV05brup___u:601: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam agnau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:603: viṣāsahir iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:604: sa ya etam evam upāste viṣāsahir ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:606: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam apsu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:608: pratirūpa iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:609: sa ya etam evam upāste pratirūpaṃ haivainam upagacchati nāpratirūpam |
GV05brup___u:611: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ādarśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:613: rociṣṇur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:614: sa ya etam evam upāste rociṣṇur ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:618: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ yantaṃ paścāc chabbo 'nūdety etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti
GV05brup___u:620: asur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:621: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti |

GV05brup___u:623: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ dikṣu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:625: dvitīyo 'napaga iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:626: sa ya etam evam upāste dvitīyavān ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:628: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ chāyāmayaḥ puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:630: mṛtyur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:631: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti |
GV05brup___u:632: nainaṃ purā kālān mṛtyur āgacchati || BrhUp_2,1.12 ||
GV05brup___u:633: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ātmani puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:635: ātmanvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:636: sa ya etam evam upāsta ātmanvī ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:638: sa ha tūṣṇīm āsa gārgyaḥ || BrhUp_2,1.13 ||
GV05brup___u:642: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- upa tvāyānīti || BrhUp_2,1.14 ||
GV05brup___u:643: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- pratilomaṃ caitad yad brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyam upeyād
GV05brup___u:648: tam etair nāmabhir āmantrayāṃ cakre bṛhan pāṇdaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti |
GV05brup___u:652: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ
GV05brup___u:653: puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūt kuta etad āgād iti |
GV05brup___u:654: tad u ha na mene gārgyaḥ || BrhUp_2,1.16 ||
GV05brup___u:655: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ
GV05brup___u:656: puruṣas tad eṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijnānam ādāya ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaya ākāśas tasmiñ chete
GV05brup___u:664: sa yatraitat svapnyayā carati te hāsya lokāḥ |
GV05brup___u:665: tad uteva mahārājo bhavaty uteva mahābrāhmaṇaḥ |
GV05brup___u:667: sa yathā mahārājo jānapadān gṛhītvā sve janapade yathākāmaṃ parivartetaivam evaiṣa etat prāṇān gṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate || BrhUp_2,1.18 ||
GV05brup___u:670: hitā nāma nādyo dvāsaptatiḥ sahasrāṇi hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratiṣṭhante |
GV05brup___u:672: sa yathā kumāro add. vā mahārājo vā mahābrāhmaṇo vātighnīm ānandasya gatvā śayīta |
GV05brup___u:674: sa yathorṇavābhis tantunoccared yathā agneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranty evam evāsmād ātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti |
GV05brup___u:676: prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eṣa satyam || BrhUp_2,1.20 ||
GV05brup___u:677: yo ha vai śiśuṃ sādhānaṃ sapratyādhānaṃ sasthūṇaṃ sadāmaṃ veda sapta ha dviṣato bhrātṛvyān avaruṇaddhi |
GV05brup___u:678: ayaṃ vāva śiśur yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ |
GV05brup___u:679: tasyedam evādhānam idaṃ pratyādhānaṃ prāṇaḥ sthūṇānnaṃ dāma || BrhUp_2,2.1
GV05brup___u:681: tad yā imā akṣaṃl lohinyo rājayas tābhir enaṃ rudro 'nvāyattaḥ |
GV05brup___u:682: atha yā akṣann āpas tābhiḥ parjanyaḥ |
GV05brup___u:688: nāsyānnaṃ kṣīyate ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_2,2.2 ||
GV05brup___u:690: arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnas tasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam |
GV05brup___u:691: tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīre vāg aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti |
GV05brup___u:693: idaṃ tac charīra eṣa hy arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ |
GV05brup___u:701: vāg ghy aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvitte || BrhUp_2,2.3 ||
GV05brup___u:710: attir ha vai nāmaitad yad autrir iti |
GV05brup___u:712: sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_2,2.4 ||
GV05brup___u:718: tad etan mūrtaṃ yad anyad vāyoś cāntarikṣāc ca |
GV05brup___u:722: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso ya eṣa tapati |
GV05brup___u:729: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣaḥ
GV05brup___u:733: idam eva mūrtaṃ yad anyat prāṇāc ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ |
GV05brup___u:737: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yac cakṣuḥ |
GV05brup___u:739: athāmūrtaṃ prāṇaś ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ |
GV05brup___u:743: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ
GV05brup___u:747: yathā māhārajanaṃ vāso yathā pāṇḍvāvikaṃ yathendragopo yathāgnyarcir yathā puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā sakṛdvidyuttam |
GV05brup___u:748: sakṛdvidyutteva ha vā asya śrīr bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:750: na hy etasmād iti nety anyat param asti |
GV05brup___u:754: maitreyīti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- udyāsyan vā are 'ham asmāt sthānād asmi
GV05brup___u:756: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yan nu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthivī vittena pūrṇā
GV05brup___u:759: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syāt |
GV05brup___u:761: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kim ahaṃ tena kuryām |
GV05brup___u:762: yad eva bhagavān veda tad eva me brūhīti || BrhUp_2,4.3 ||
GV05brup___u:763: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- priyā batāre naḥ satī priyaṃ bhāṣase |
GV05brup___u:767: sa hovāca -- na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati |
GV05brup___u:768: na vā are jāyāyai kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati |
GV05brup___u:769: na vā are putrāṇāṃ kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:770: na vā are vittasya kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:771: na vā are brahmaṇaḥ kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:772: na vā are kṣatrasya kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavati
GV05brup___u:773: na vā are lokānāṃ kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:774: na vā are devānāṃ kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:775: na vā are bhūtānāṃ kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanti
GV05brup___u:776: na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:777: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyi |
GV05brup___u:778: ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam ||
GV05brup___u:779: brahma taṃ parādād yo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda |

GV05brup___u:2607: punar mām aitu indriyaṃ punas tejaḥ punar bhagaḥ |
GV05brup___u:2609: ity anāmikāṅguṣṭhābhyām ādāyāntareṇa stanau vā bhruvau vā nimṛjyāt ||
GV05brup___u:2610: atha yady udaka ātmānaṃ paśyet tad abhimantrayeta -- mayi teja indriyaṃ
GV05brup___u:2612: śrīr ha vā eṣā strīṇāṃ yan malodvāsāḥ |
GV05brup___u:2614: sā ced asmai na dadyāt kāmam enām avakriṇīyāt |
GV05brup___u:2615: sā ced asmai naiva dadyāt kāmam enāṃ yaṣṭyā vā pāṇinā vopahatyātikrāmet |
GV05brup___u:2616: indriyena te yaśasā yaśa ādada iti |
GV05brup___u:2618: sā ced asmai dadyād indriyeṇa te yaśasā yaśa ādadhāmīti |
GV05brup___u:2620: sa yām icchet -- kāmayeta meti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyopastham asyā abhimṛśya japet --
GV05brup___u:2622: sa tvam aṅgakaṣāyo 'si digdhaviddhām iva mādayemām amūṃ mayīti ||
GV05brup___u:2623: atha yām icchen na garbhaṃ dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyābhiprāṇyāpānyāt
GV05brup___u:2624: indriyeṇa te retasā reta ādada iti |
GV05brup___u:2626: atha yām icched dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyāpānyābhiprāṇyāt |
GV05brup___u:2629: atha yasya jāyāyai jāraḥ syāt taṃ ced dviṣyād āmapātre 'gnim upasamādhāya pratilomaṃ śarabarhiḥ stīrtvā tasminn etāḥ śarabhṛṣṭīḥ pratilomāḥ sarpiṣāktā juhuyāt |
GV05brup___u:2638: sa vā eṣa nirindriyo visukṛto 'smāl lokād praiti yam evaṃvid brāhmaṇaḥ śapati |
GV05brup___u:2640: uta hy evaṃvit paro bhavati || BrhUp_6,4.12 ||
GV05brup___u:2641: atha yasya jāyām ārtavaṃ vindet tryahaṃ kaṃse na pibet |
GV05brup___u:2645: sa ya icchet -- putro me śuklo jāyeta vedam anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād
GV05brup___u:2648: atha ya icchet -- putro me kapilaḥ piṅgalo jāyeta dvau vedāv anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti dadhyodanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2650: atha ya icchet -- putro me śyāmo lohitākṣo jāyeta trīn vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti udaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2652: atha ya icched -- duhitā me paṇḍitā jāyeta sarvam āyur iyād iti tilaudanaṃ
GV05brup___u:2655: atha ya icchet -- putro me paṇḍito vigītaḥ samitiṃgamaḥ śuśrūṣitāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣitā jāyeta sarvān vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti māṃsaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2658: athābhiprātar eva sthālīpākāvṛtājyaṃ ceṣṭitvā sthālīpākasyopaghātaṃ juhoty agnaye svāhānumataye svāhā devāya savitre satyaprasavāya svāheti |
GV05brup___u:2661: prakṣālya pāṇī udapātraṃ pūrayitvā tenaināṃ trir abhyukṣati --
GV05brup___u:2664: athainām abhipadyate -- amo 'ham asmi sā tvam |
GV05brup___u:2668: tāv ehi saṃrabhāvahai saha reto dadhāvahai |
GV05brup___u:2670: athāsyā ūrū vihāpayati -- vijihīthāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī iti |
GV05brup___u:2671: tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāya trir enām anulomām anumārṣṭi --
GV05brup___u:2672: viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu |
GV05brup___u:2673: ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te |
GV05brup___u:2674: garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi pṛthuṣṭuke |
GV05brup___u:2675: garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv ādhattāṃ puṣkarasrajau || BrhUp_6,4.21 ||
GV05brup___u:2677: taṃ te garbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtaye |
GV05brup___u:2678: yathāgnigarbhā pṛthivī yathā dyaur aindreṇa garbhiṇī |
GV05brup___u:2679: vāyur diśāṃ yathā garbha evaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi te 'sāv iti || BrhUp_6,4.22
GV05brup___u:2682: evā te garbha ejatu sahāvaitu jarāyuṇā |
GV05brup___u:2684: tam indra nirjahi garbheṇa sāvarāṃ saheti || BrhUp_6,4.23 ||
GV05brup___u:2685: jāte 'gnim upasamādhāyāṅka ādhāya kaṃse pṛṣadājyaṃ saṃnīya pṛṣadājyasyopaghātaṃ juhoti
GV05brup___u:2687: asyopasandyāṃ mā chaitsīt prajayā ca paśubhiś ca svāhā |
GV05brup___u:2688: mayi prāṇāṃs tvayi manasā juhomi svāhā |
GV05brup___u:2689: yat karmaṇātyarīricam yad vā nyūnam ihākaram |
GV05brup___u:2690: agniṣṭat sviṣṭakṛd vidvān sviṣṭaṃ suhutaṃ karotu naḥ svāheti ||
GV05brup___u:2691: athāsya dakṣiṇaṃ karṇam abhinidhāya vāg vāg iti triḥ |
GV05brup___u:2692: atha dadhi madhu ghṛtaṃ saṃnīyānantarhitena jātarūpeṇa prāśayati |
GV05brup___u:2693: bhūs te dadhāmi bhuvas te dadhāmi svas te dadhāmi bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ sarvaṃ tvayi dadhāmīti athāsya nāma karoti vedo 'sīti |
GV05brup___u:2694: tad asyaitad guhyam eva nāma bhavati || BrhUp_6,4.26 ||
GV05brup___u:2695: athainaṃ mātre pradāya stanaṃ prayacchati -- yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ |
GV05brup___u:2696: yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tam iha dhātave kar iti ||
GV05brup___u:2697: athāsya mātaram abhimantrayate -- ilāsi maitrāvaruṇī vīre vīram ajījanat |
GV05brup___u:2698: sā tvaṃ vīravatī bhava yāsmān vīravato 'karad iti |
GV05brup___u:2699: taṃ vā etam āhuḥ -- atipitā batābhūḥ |
GV05brup___u:2701: paramāṃ bata kāṣṭhāṃ prāpa śriyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena |
GV05brup___u:2702: ya evaṃvido brāhmaṇasya putro jāyata iti || BrhUp_6,4.28 ||
